Title: Bloget
Description: Bloget is an ASP.NET Custom Control that easily and quickly creates a blog for your Web site. You can add a new blog to your Web site in as little as two lines of code. "One File, One Binary, One Blog"

Project Description
Bloget is an ASP.NET Custom Control that easily and quickly creates a blog for your Web site. You can add a new blog to your Web site in as little as two lines of code. "One File, One Binary, One Blog"
